Localization.Name: Polaris 2955 Ship Showdown Poster
Localization.Description: Congratulations to the Polaris for winning the 2955 Ship Showdown. This poster celebrates the beloved corvette-class capital ship that sports devastating firepower and a hangar that can fit a light fighter.
